Today, Dan and Jordan check in on Alex, only to find that he's no longer so worried about his fears about a race war, and has pivoted over to theories about Covid vaccines causing monkeypox.

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/5/22/episode-684-may-20-2022 Episode #684: May 20, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex has decided that the non-mRNA Covid vaccines cause monkeypox
*Alex misreports [https://www.aap.com.au/factcheck/claims-of-a-who-globalist-takeover-are-out-of-this-world/ news about the WHO] proposing [https://apps.who.int/gb/ebwha/pdf_files/WHA75/A75_18-en.pdf amendments to its International Health Regulations]
*There was [https://www.newsweek.com/monkeypox-cased-uk-massachusetts-case-vaccine-ordered-us-1708075 a case of monkeypox in MA], which led to orders of vaccines
*The [https://www.who.int/emergencies/disease-outbreak-news/item/2022-DON385 current monkeypox outbreak]
*The [https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5227a5.htm 2003 monkeypox outbreak]
*[https://www.cdc.gov/media/releases/2021/s1119-smallpox-vials.html Story about vials] labeled smallpox being discovered
*[https://www.nytimes.com/2022/02/01/us/cdc-monkeys-pennsylvania-truck-crash.html Story about truck] transporting monkeys crashing (the monkeys were [https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/monkeys-loose-pennsylvania-highway-crash-rcna13149 promptly found])
*Alex claims that the Astrazeneca vaccine contains monkey DNA, but it actually just uses [https://extranet.who.int/pqweb/sites/default/files/documents/pl-azd1222-en.pdf a chimpanzee adenovirus], which is not the same thing
*Alex [https://factcheck.afp.com/doc.afp.com.329J2TA completely misreports a story] connecting a recent hepatitis outbreak with the Covid vaccines
*Alex overhypes [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8354782/#:~:text=The%20autoimmune%20response%20or%20S1,mRNA%20vaccine%20against%20COVID%2D19. a case study of one person] who got meningitis after receiving the Covid vaccine
*[https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/is-it-true/is-it-true-does-the-vaxzevria-astrazeneca-vaccine-contain-animal-dna Australian health website] about whether or not the vaccine has animal DNA in it
